So to accomplish that, the research team used resources from already ongoing projects to first mutate and then cybernetically enhance humans, focusing on developing whatever qualities the military needed at the time.  This lab is one of several places in which the actual modifications were performed.
translation: 好吧，让我告诉你一些基本知识。不久前，军方启动了一项联合研究项目，其最终目标是创造出能够执行各种具体任务的仿生战斗人员——简单地说就是B.O.W。为了尽可能降低维护费用，研究小组利用现有项目的资源进行首次突变，然后通过控制增强人类，集中精力开发当时军队所需的特质能力。这个实验室是实际改造的几个实验室之一。

original: Let's go!
translation: 我们走吧!

original: Let's go, then.
translation: 那么，走吧。

original: Let's go.
translation: 我们走吧。

original: Life Drain Effect
translation: 生命汲取

original: Life Drain Shell
translation: 生命汲取外壳

original: Living weapons in a sense, but they're still as human as you or me.  All cyborged up and injected full of mutagenic treatments, doc says they lost a lot of their memories but they don't really act too much like the killing machines those eggheads wanted…
translation: 从某种意义上说是活武器，但他们还是和你我一样的人类。所有的机器人都被注射了大量的诱变剂，医生说他们失去了很多记忆，但其实他们的行为并不像那些书呆子想要的杀人机器…

original: Look at me again, and tell me I'm lying.
translation: 你再看着我, 然后还敢说我在撒谎吗

original: Looking down at the note, you memorize the location shown.
translation: 看着这张纸条，你记下了它的位置。

original: Looks about right.  Can be hard to tell for sure if that's your badge or not, but they contracted the work out to all sorts of weirdos, and they made all sorts of crazy shit.  They could slap the Bio-Weapon label on a zombie swinging around a sword and it still wouldn't be the strangest thing out there.
translation: 看起来合适。很难确定那是不是你的徽章，但是他们把工作安排给了各种各样的怪人，他们做了各种各样的疯狂的事情。他们可以给挥舞着剑的僵尸贴上生物武器的标签，但这也不是最奇怪的事情。

original: MK-2 Ionic Cannon
translation: MK-2等离子炮

original: MX-84 laser sniper
translation: MX-84激光狙击枪（UPS）

original: Map To Unknown Lab
translation: 未知实验室的地图

original: Maps To Unknown Lab
translation: 未知实验室的地图

original: Maybe I was wrong about judging you based on your lack of a badge.  If you are who you claim to be, then know this.  Apophis is the culmination of all the research that came from your creation.  I know you might be eager to fight, but we need to be ready.
translation: 嗯，也许我对你没有徽章的判断是错误的。如果你是你自称的那个人，那么你要知道这一点。阿波菲斯是来自你的创造物的所有研究的顶点。我知道你可能渴望战斗，但我们需要做好准备。

original: Maybe another time.  Bye.
translation: 也许下次吧。再见。

original: Members of the Command Center seeking refuge from ...something.  They have intel and some connections to the Old Guard.
translation: 指挥中心的人正在某种东西的威胁下寻求…庇护。他们有情报，并且和旧世守护者有一定的联系。

original: Military augmentation project, same people handing out the badge you're wearing.  Guessing you know enough about it if you have one yourself.  Don't remember much up until Router found me and took me in, same deal as Sigma.
translation: 一些人戴着和你一样的徽章，我想如果你也有一个, 你应该知道不少。我啥都不记得了, 直到鲁特发现了我并把我带进来, 西格玛也是一样。

original: Misdirection
translation: 误导

original: Monomolecular Sword
translation: 单分子剑

original: Monomolecular Sword CBM
translation: 单分子剑CBM

original: Must be tough…
translation: 一定很艰难吧…

original: Mycus B.W.M.D
translation: 真菌B.W.M.D

original: NEO-33 laser pistol
translation: NEO-33激光枪（UPS）

original: No.  Place was fairly quiet initially, no sign of those things when we arrived.  We went in to make sure it was clear, then the guy I was traveling with kept watch outside.  Was maybe a day or two of turning the place inside-out when a group of them swarmed the area, tore the poor bastard apart.  I think he took a few with him, but even they aren't all immune to this zombie thing.  I holed up in the bunker once I realized I was alone...
translation: 没有。一开始这个地方相当安静，我们到达时没有这些东西的迹象。我们进去确认清楚，然后和我一起旅行的那个人在外面守望。可能是一两天的时间，当一群人蜂拥而至，把这个可怜的混蛋撕成碎片的时候。我想他带了一些，但即使是他们也不能对僵尸免疫。当我意识到只有我一个人的时候我就躲在地堡里…

original: Not good.  I had another person with me when I arrived, and he was guarding the vehicle when those things showed up.  Luckily they seemed reluctant to barge into the bunker, and things are getting hectic out there as it seems my buddy took a couple of them out before he bit it, and they started getting back up…
translation: 不是很好，我和我的伙伴一起到达的这里。当那些东西出现时，他正在看守车辆，万幸他们似乎不愿意冲进地堡，外面越来越混乱。我哥们在被他们咬中之前击倒了一部分，可没过多久它们就重新站了起来。

original: Oh, good luck, I suppose.
translation: 哦，我想祝你好运。

original: Oh, no proof huh?.  I hope you are being truthful…
translation: 哦，没有证据啊？…我希望你是诚实的……

original: Oh, okay.
translation: 哦，好吧。

original: Oh.
translation: 哦。

original: Oh.  I'd rather try to find the place with some help, so if you're willing to later on maybe…
translation: 我宁愿去找个其他地方，或许可能对我有些帮助。如果以后你愿意的话，我们可以在讨论。

original: Oi, cease with these shenanigans, ye debuggers!
translation: 喂，别再胡闹了，调试器们！

original: Okay, I'll do it.
translation: 好的，我会做的。

original: Okay.
translation: 好吧。

original: Okay…
translation: 好吧...

original: Omnitech Labs' single shot laser rifle, designed to deal massive damage to a single target.  Intended to be used as a long-range support weapon by modern special forces.  Requires an insane amount of energy to fire a single powerful laser, additionally providing EMP effects.  This one has been converted to use UPS as its fuel source.
translation: Omnitech实验室生产的单发式激光狙击步枪，用于对单一目标造成巨大伤害。被现代特种部队用作远程支援武器。需要大量能量作为代价来发射，还可额外造成EMP效果，使用UPS供能。

original: Omnitech Labs' single shot laser rifle, designed to deal massive damage to a single target.  Intended to be used as a long-range support weapon by modern special forces.  Requires an insane amount of energy to fire a single powerful laser, additionally providing EMP effects.  Uses a proprietary atomic battery capacitor system
translation: Omnitech实验室生产的单发式激光狙击步枪，用于对单一目标造成巨大伤害。被现代特种部队用作远程支援武器。需要大量能量作为代价来发射，还可额外造成EMP效果。

original: Omnitech UPS conversion kit
translation: 核能UPS电源转换套件

original: Omnitech UPS conversion manual
translation: Omnitech UPS转换手册

original: One of the diluted batches, right?  No mutagenic package, probably recruited from the army kids assigned to guard the labs… still one of us, close enough at least.  You want the real deal, then so be it.  I'll follow your lead.
translation: 你属于降低效果的一批，对吧？没有诱变剂，可能是从军队中被招募来保护生物武器实验室的战士。不过你仍然是我们之中的一员，你想与我们交易吗？我会听从你的领导。

original: Original model?  I'm not sure if I should take that as a compliment or not.  I guess it'd be better than doing nothing and wasting time here.  Ready when you are.
translation: 原始型号?我不确定我是否应该把这当作一种赞美。当你做好了准备。我想这比什么都不做，在这里浪费时间要好。

original: Otherworldly adrenaline.  Keep the pressure up and you should be fine.
translation: 超凡的肾上腺素。保持压力，你会没事的。

original: Part of the Super Soldier project, actually.
translation: 这里有点无聊吧？

original: People who all their lives have seen nothing but fighting in a ring for the amusement of the rich.  Most of the saner captives and new meat end up in Blue Team, pitted against hardened and "broken in" combatants.
translation: 他们是一辈子除了为了富人的娱乐而战斗之外一无所有的人。大多数神志正常的俘虏和新的肉食最终都会加入蓝色的队伍, 与那些冷血而残缺的家伙们对抗。

original: People who all their lives have seen nothing but fighting in a ring for the amusement of the rich. Devoid of reason they think the cataclysm is but another round, barely able to tell each other apart from the other team.
translation: 他们是一辈子除了为了富人的娱乐而战斗之外一无所有的人。他们毫无理由地认为这场大灾难不过是另一轮角斗游戏，很难将它们和另一个队伍进行区分。

original: Plasma Pulse Cell
translation: 等离子脉冲电池

original: Plasma Pulse Cell CBM
translation: 等离子脉冲电池 CBM

original: Prepper
translation: 准备者

original: Prepper Household
translation: 准备者家庭

original: Preppers
translation: 末日幸存者

original: Pressurized hydrogen
translation: 加压氢

original: Pretty certain seeing this is a bug too, since you'd have to die to fail this.
translation: 很确定看到这也是一个错误，因为你必须死才能失败。

original: Primary side effect to Biostim.  Lasts an hour, and will escalate to a more dangerous effect if you escalate its intensity.
translation: 兴奋剂的主要副作用.  持续一个小时。如果提高副作用的强度会变的更危险

original: Priority Site
translation: 科研大楼

original: Project… you're right.  Between that and your augmentations, it's hard to deny the evidence right in front of me.  Sorry I doubted you.
translation: 你是对的，这个项目算是认证你身份的证据了, 我很难否认，抱歉我怀疑了你。

original:
Quick and fluid movements make you harder to catch.

+1 Dodge attempts, Dodge skill increased by 25%% of Intelligence, immunity to knockdown.
Lasts for 1 turn.
translation:
快速流畅的动作让你更难被抓住。

+1次躲闪尝试，躲闪技能增加25%智力，击倒免疫。
暂停1次。

original: Radiation!
translation: 辐射!

original: Radiogenic Vision
translation: 辐射透视镜

original: Ragtag branch of the military that survived the initial cataclysm.   Allied to the command center, they seek leadership in this new world.
translation: 在最初的大灾难中幸存下来的军队的一个支部。他们与指挥中心结盟，在这个新世界寻求领导权

original: Reach Command Center
translation: 到达指挥中心

original: Rebuilding Civilization: Advanced Barter
translation: 重建文明：高级易货

original: Rebuilding Civilization: Barter
translation: 重建文明：易货

original: Rebuilding Civilization: Pistols
translation: 重建文明:手枪

original: Reveals an area around you on the overmap.
translation: 在大地图上显示你周围的区域。

original: Rifle built with parts salvaged from a Chain Lightning CBM.  Fires bolts of electricity that jump between nearby enemies.
translation: 用连锁闪电CBM改造的步枪，可以发射能跳跃于附近的敌人之间的电弧。

original: Right.  Research Directive Z-12 ring a bell to you, Hunter?
translation: 对。研究指令Z - 12是否与您有关，猎人？

original: Router gets worried about stuff too easily.  He's like an overprotective parent.  Though I guess he sorta IS that, since he was the project lead for our batch.  Aside from dying of boredom, I think I'll be alright.
translation: 鲁特就像一个过度保护孩子的家长, 操心这个操心那个, 尽管如此, 他是我们的项目负责人。因此除了无聊到死之外, 我想我没什么问题。

original: Scavenged the kit along the way.  I wouldn't still be alive if I wasn't both resourceful and lucky.  I'd rather not talk about what I've had to go through to survive, at least not right now.  Okay?
translation: 如果我既不足智多谋又不幸运，我就不会活着。我宁愿不谈我为了生存所经历的一切，至少现在不谈。好吧?

original: Security breach at a Bio-Weapon lab… that might've been Evelynn actually, not just the creatures that were there.
translation: 生物武器实验室的安全漏洞...实际上可能是伊芙琳，而不仅仅是那里的生物武器。

original: Seeing this is probably a bug.
translation: 看到这可能是一个错误。

original: Seeing this is probably also a bug.
translation: 看到这可能也是一个错误。

original: Seems it's harder to conceal that than I thought.  You're right, and I suppose that also confirms I can trust you with this.  Though you're wrong about that last bit, didn't stay a CO for very long.  Long story, don't ask.  Just be careful who you reveal this information to, okay?
translation: 似乎比我想象的更难掩饰。你说得对，我想这也证实了我可以信任你。虽然你在最后一点上错了，但我没在公司待太久。说来话长，别问了。小心你把这些信息透露给谁，好吗？

original: Seems like you got it good here.
translation: 看来你在这里做得很好。

original: Seems like you've got a lot on your plate.
translation: 似乎你有很多事要做。

original: Sentinel
translation: 车载高压灭菌釜

original: Sentinel Conditioning: Mental
translation: 前哨条件反射：精神

original: Sentinel Conditioning: Physical
translation: 哨兵条件反射：物理

original: Sentinel Dexterity I
translation: 哨兵灵巧一

original: Sentinel Dexterity II
translation: 哨兵灵巧II

original: Sentinel Dexterity III
translation: 哨兵灵巧III

original: Sentinel Dexterity IV
translation: 哨兵灵巧IV

original: Sentinel Dexterity V
translation: 哨兵灵巧V

original: Sentinel Intelligence I
translation: 哨兵情报I

original: Sentinel Intelligence II
translation: 哨兵情报II

original: Sentinel Intelligence III
translation: 哨兵情报III

original: Sentinel Intelligence IV
translation: 哨兵情报四

original: Sentinel Intelligence V
translation: 哨兵情报V

original: Sentinel Perception I
translation: 哨兵感知I

original: Sentinel Perception II
translation: 哨兵感知II

original: Sentinel Perception III
translation: 哨兵感知III

original: Sentinel Perception IV
translation: 哨兵感知IV

original: Sentinel Perception V
translation: 哨兵感知V

original: Sentinel Physicality I
translation: 哨兵体质I

original: Sentinel Physicality II
translation: 哨兵体质II

original: Sentinel Physicality III
translation: 哨兵体质III

original: Sentinel Readiness I
translation: 哨兵准备I

original: Sentinel Readiness II
translation: 哨兵准备II

original: Sentinel Readiness III
translation: 哨兵准备III

original: Sentinel Reflexes I
translation: 哨兵反射Ⅰ

original: Sentinel Reflexes II
translation: 哨兵反射Ⅱ

original: Sentinel Reflexes III
translation: 哨兵反射III

original: Sentinel Strength I
translation: 哨兵力量I

original: Sentinel Strength II
translation: 哨兵力量II

original: Sentinel Strength III
translation: 哨兵力量III

original: Sentinel Strength IV
translation: 哨兵力量四

original: Sentinel Strength V
translation: 哨兵力量V

original: Sentinel Synapse I
translation: 前哨突触Ⅰ

original: Sentinel Synapse II
translation: 前哨突触Ⅱ

original: Sentinel Synapse III
translation: 前哨突触Ⅲ

original: Shit.  Seems it's harder to hide than I thought.  They sent me to investigate what happened to these installations, re-establish contact with any remaining personnel or bio-weapons that haven't gone rogue, then see what can be done from there.  I don't know what your last orders were or why you're here, but maybe we have a common goal.
translation: 该死, 似乎比我想象的更难隐藏。他们派我去调查这些设施发生了什么，重新与任何没有失控的人员或生物武器建立联系，然后看看能做些什么。我不知道你最后的命令是什么，也不知道你为什么来这里，但也许我们有一个共同的目标。

original: Short and sharp claws made from a high-tech metal welded to metal knuckles.  Lightweight and fast, wielding them feels as if you were bare-handed.
translation: 短而锋利的爪子由高科技金属焊接到金属关节上。使用它轻而快速，挥舞它的感觉就像你是赤手空拳一样。

original: Similar to AEA_PAIN except message is suppressed.
translation: 与 AEA_PAIN 类似, 只是消息被抑制了

original: Sketchy Cabin
translation: 简陋小屋

original: Slave Fighter (Blade)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (刀锋)

original: Slave Fighter (Claws)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (利爪)

original: Slave Fighter (Shocker)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (电击)

original: Slave Fighter (Weapon Master)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (武器大师)

original: Slave Fighter's Freedom
translation: 自由的奴隶斗士

original: Slave Fighters (Blue Team)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (蓝队)

original: Slave Fighters (Red Team)
translation: 奴隶斗士 (红队)

original: So now what are you going to do?
translation: 现在你打算怎么办？

original: So you don't know about them, huh?  Maybe I'm wasting my time… but you did find this place, so you probably know what you're doing.
translation: 所以你不知道他们的事?也许我是在浪费时间……但你确实找到了这个地方，所以你可能知道你在做什么。

original: So, what can I help you with?
translation: 那么，我能帮你什么？

original: So, what happened?
translation: 那么，发生了什么？

original: Somehow I doubt that… in fact seeing this is probably another bug, given you can't really bluff your way out of this mission.
translation: 不知何故，我怀疑…事实上，看到这可能是另一个错误，鉴于你不能真正吓唬你的方式退出这项任务。

original: Sorry, Nothing
translation: 抱歉, 没事

original: Sounds like a good start, don't have any other standing orders to follow.  What have you got for me?
translation: 听起来像一个好的开始，不需要遵守其他标准。你有什么给我吗?

original: Soundwave Disruption
translation: 强力静音鞋

original: Super Bio-engineer
translation: 超级B.A.M.R.U

original: Super Juggernaut
translation: 超级主宰

original: Super Scout
translation: 超级侦察兵

original: Super Soldier
translation: 超级战士

original: Super Soldier Marker
translation: 超级战士标记

original: Super Soldiers
translation: 超级战士

original: Superalloy Composite
translation: 超合金复合材料

original: Sure!  This is the recreation room and lobby, and the kitchen is next to it.  Down there is the main hallway.  First door on the left is the dormitory, the Bio-Weapons are usually there.  Across from that is just a bunch of junk metal.  Down the hall you have the restroom on the right, then the research room on the left.  Our leader, Router, is there.  He can be a weirdo but he keeps us safe.  Go talk to people if you need anything.
translation: 当然!这是娱乐室和大堂，厨房就在旁边。下面是主走廊。左边的第一个门是宿舍，生物武器通常在那里。对面是一堆垃圾金属。沿着走廊走下去，洗手间在右边，然后研究室在左边。我们的领袖鲁特在那里。他可能是个怪人，但他会保护我们的安全。如果你需要什么，就去找人谈谈。

original: Sure, just clean up after yourself and try to not piss anyone off.  Help is appreciated, if you have the time.
translation: 当然，你可以自己清理一下，尽量不要惹恼任何人。如果你有时间，我很感激你的帮助。

original: Sure, why not.  I have nothing better to do anyway, and if I'm lucky I can trust you not to get us both killed.
translation: 当然,为什么不。反正我也没什么好做的，如果幸运的话，我相信你不会把我们两个都杀了。

original: Surge of adrenaline with side effects.  The effects granted will give adequate information, so no cast message.
translation: 肾上腺素激增，有副作用。所授予的效果将提供足够的信息，因此没有施法信息

original: Survival, and eventually research.  We'll manage given time.  Keep an eye on Sigma and Lambda while you're at it… talk to them maybe?  I've been busy working on repairs almost constantly, and they're both likely to go stir-crazy if they have nothing to do but sit around all day.  Might help them figure out for themselves what to do.
translation: 生存及最终的研究，我们会安排好时间的。你或许可以与西格玛和兰姆达谈谈?我几乎一直在忙着修理汽车，如果他们整天无所事事，就很可能会发疯。也许你能帮助他们自己想出该怎么做。

original: Survivor Combatives
translation: 幸存者格斗术

original: Survivor Combatives Manual
translation: 幸存者格斗手册

original: Survivor Gun Cart
translation: 幸存者武装推车

original: Survivor Station
translation: 车载幸存者工作站

original: Survivor Story
translation: 幸存者

original: Survivor Tractor
translation: 幸存者拖拉机

original: Survivor's Cookbook
translation: 幸存者食谱

original: Survivor's Militarized RV
translation: 幸存者房车

original: Survivors who had prepared for the cataclysm before the idea of it was on the radar.  They possess the means to rebuild.
translation: 这些生还者在大灾变出现之前就已经做好了准备。他们拥有重建的手段。

original: Suuuure, right.  You don't even have the badge.  Try and be careful who you lie to next time.
translation: 真的吗？可你甚至连徽章都没有，下次撒谎的时候要小心了。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has altered your neurology.  You find it a bit easier to handle the death of your enemies, combat skills develop somewhat faster, and you find technical skills slightly easier.  In exchange, you find learning from books a bit slower, and it is slightly harder to persuade or deceive others.
translation: 靶向诱变治疗改变了你的神经系统。你会发现对付敌人的死亡要容易一些，战斗技能的发展要快一些，而技术技能的发展要容易一些。作为交换，你会发现从书本上学习要慢一点，说服或欺骗别人也会稍微困难一点。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has altered your neurology.  You find it easier to handle the death of your enemies, combat skills develop faster, and you find technical skills easier.  In exchange, you find learning from books to be slower, and it is harder to persuade or deceive others.
translation: 靶向诱变治疗改变了你的神经系统。你发现对付敌人的死亡更容易，战斗技能发展更快，技术技能也更容易。作为交换，你会发现从书本上学习要慢一些，说服或欺骗别人也更难。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has altered your neurology.  You find it much easier to handle the death of your enemies, combat skills develop far faster, and you find technical skills a lot easier.  In exchange, you find learning from books to be much slower, and it is far harder to deceive others.
translation: 靶向诱变治疗改变了你的神经系统。你发现对付敌人的死亡要容易得多，战斗技能的发展要快得多，技术技能也要容易得多。作为交换，你会发现从书本上学习要慢得多，欺骗别人要困难得多。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has honed your senses.  Your sight radius on the overmap is extended, you hear a bit better, and instinctively move a bit more quietly.  In exchange, your reflexive reaction to potential threats slightly agitates wildlife and unsettles people.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗磨练了你的感官。你在总图上的视野半径扩大了，你的听力好了一点，本能地移动得更安静一点。作为交换，你对潜在威胁的反身反应会稍微激怒野生动物，让人不安。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has honed your senses.  Your sight radius on the overmap is greatly extended, you hear better, and instinctively move more quietly.  In exchange, your reflexive reaction to potential threats somewhat agitates wildlife and unsettles people.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗磨练了你的感官。你在总图上的视野半径大大扩大，你的听力更好，本能地移动得更安静。作为交换，你对潜在威胁的反身反应在一定程度上激怒了野生动物，让人们不安。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has honed your senses.  Your sight radius on the overmap is massively extended, you hear much better, and instinctively move silently.  In exchange, your reflexive reaction to potential threats agitates wildlife and unsettles people.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗磨练了你的感官。你在总览图上的视野范围被大大扩大了，你的听觉好多了，本能地安静地移动。作为交换，你对潜在威胁的本能反应会激怒野生动物，让人们不安。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has improved your muscular development.  Your maximum stamina, stamina regeneration, and maximum weight carried is 25% greater, and you heal slightly faster.  In exchange, your metabolism and thirst is slightly increased, and your body runs a bit warm.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗改善了你的肌肉发育。你的最大耐力、耐力恢复和携带的最大重量增加25%，并且你的治疗速度稍微快一点。作为交换，你的新陈代谢和口渴稍微增加，你的身体运行有点温暖。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has improved your muscular development.  Your maximum stamina, stamina regeneration, and maximum weight carried is 50% greater, and you heal faster.  In exchange, your metabolism and thirst is increased, and your body runs slightly hotter.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗改善了你的肌肉发育。你的最大耐力、耐力回复和最大负重增加50%，你的治疗速度更快。作为交换，你的新陈代谢和口渴增加，你的身体运行略热。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has improved your muscular development.  Your maximum stamina, stamina regeneration, and maximum weight carried is doubled, and you heal much faster.  In exchange, your metabolism and thirst is further increased, and your body runs hotter.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗改善了你的肌肉发育。你的最大耐力，耐力恢复，和最大负重是原来的两倍，你的恢复速度更快。作为交换，你的新陈代谢和口渴会进一步增加，你的身体会变得更热。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has sharpened your reflexes.  You can move and attack a bit faster, and your dodging is improved slightly.  In exchange, you need slightly more rest than normal, and are slightly more sensitive to electrical discharges.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗提高了你的反应能力。你可以移动和攻击的速度快一点，你的躲闪略有改善。作为交换，你需要比平时稍微多休息，对放电也稍微敏感一些。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has sharpened your reflexes.  You can move and attack faster, and your dodging is improved.  In exchange, you need more rest than normal, and are more sensitive to electrical discharges.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗提高了你的反应能力。你可以移动和攻击更快，你的躲闪能力也得到提高。作为交换，你需要比平时更多的休息，而且对放电更敏感。

original: Targeted mutagenic treatment has sharpened your reflexes.  You can move and attack much faster, and your dodging is greatly improved.  In exchange, you need much more rest than normal, and are much more sensitive to electrical discharges.
translation: 有针对性的诱变治疗提高了你的反应能力。你可以移动和攻击更快，你的躲闪能力大大提高。作为交换，你需要比平常更多的休息，而且对放电更敏感。

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy.  I am stuck here, hiding from something I can't kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 我是一种用来杀戮和毁灭的武器。我呆在这里，躲着那些我解决不了的东西。真希望我能做点什么…

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy.  I'm stuck here, nothing left to kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 我是一种用来杀戮和毁灭的武器。我呆在这里，没有什么可以杀死或毁灭的。真希望我能做点什么…

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy. I am stuck here, hiding from something I can't kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀戮和毁灭。我被困在这里，躲着我无法杀死或摧毁的东西。真希望我能做点什么…

original: Tell me about it.  I am a weapon, made to kill and destroy. I am stuck here, nothing left to kill or destroy.  Wish there was something I could do…
translation: 告诉我吧。我是一种武器，用来杀戮和毁灭。我被困在这里，没有什么可以杀死或毁灭的。真希望我能做点什么…

original: Thank you.
translation: 谢谢你.

original: Thank you.  I'll follow along and maybe we'll get some answers.
translation: 谢谢，我将跟随你，也许我们会找到一些答案。

original: Thanks for trying…  I guess.
translation: 谢谢你的努力…我想是吧。

original: Thanks.
translation: 谢谢。

original: That thing you are wearing… a Bio-Weapon Badge…
translation: 你穿的那个东西…生物武器徽章…

original: That would be Sigma and Lambda.  They are very confused.  They awoke with their memory gone and only knew they were 'different'.  I found them and they helped to scavenge and build this place.  They were built for combat, I can tell they're bored out of their minds…
translation: 他们是西格玛和兰姆达，当他们醒来时很困惑，因为他们的记忆消失了，只知道他们是“不同的”。我找到了他们，他们帮助我一起清理和建造这个地方。它们是为了战斗而生的;我看得出他们已经厌倦了这里……

original: That would explain it then.  That you're here and not hostile at least confirms you're still on humanity's side.  We're here because of Apophis.  He was built to exterminate the Bio-Weapon Project, along with every person involved in your creation.  He's attracted several failed experiments to his cause as well.  They shouldn't have rushed so many victims through those procedures… we need to gather intel and make allies, more people like you.  I'm willing to trust you with this, if you're prepared for some hard fights ahead.
translation: 那就可以解释了。你在这里并且没有敌意至少证明了你仍然站在人类一边。我们在这里是因为阿波菲斯。他的建立是为了消灭生物武器项目，以及参与你们创造的每一个人。不知为什么，他也为自己的事业吸引了几个失败的生物武器。我们需要收集情报，寻找盟友，我更多像你这样的人。我愿意相信你，如果你准备好了迎接未来的艰苦战斗。

original: That you may be, but while you've been stuck in stasis, the other research teams had been poring over every last scrap of data they could get out of your production.  Even if it was two steps forward, one step back, Apophis is the culmination of all that research.  I know you might be eager to fight, but we need to prepare ourselves.
translation: 也许是这样，但是当你的研究陷入停滞时，其他的研究团队一直在仔细研究他们能从你的产品中获得的每一点数据。即使是前进了两步，后退了一步，阿波菲斯也是所有这些研究的顶峰。我知道你可能渴望战斗，但我们需要做好准备。

original: That's the fucking spirit!  You're making me want to go out there and save the world or some over-the-top bullshit like that.  You've got yourself a deal.
translation: 你让我出去拯救世界完全是在胡扯，我没有那种精神，你请自便。

original: That's what the label says, it's a sorta augmentation project.  You seem to know your stuff, guess one doesn't simply find this place by accident.  Router told me what I am.  I am stuck here until further notice.
translation: 没错。你似乎很了解这些东西，我猜你不是偶然发现这个地方的。鲁特告诉了我那是什么。我被困在这里，等待进一步通知。

original: The %s tries to grab <npcname>, but they break free!
translation: %s试图抓取<npcname>，但他们挣脱了！

original: The %s tries to grab you, but you force yourself free!
translation: 那些%s试图抓住你，但你奋力反抗！

original: The TX-5LR Cerberus is an upgrade to its predecessors.  It features a state of the art revolving laser cannon system with three barrels that charge from solar cells embedded in its hull.
translation: 用金属包裹的肉质材料制成的冲锋枪，它依赖UPS供能发射。可以在相当长的距离外击中并烧毁目标。偶尔它会抽动或发出令人不安的声音，希望它并不是真的拥有意识…

original: The archery volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from correct positioning to the usage of advanced bows in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的弓术篇，这本书包含了从正确定位到使用高级弓的一切知识。

original: The bartering volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from what supplies are worth more after the cataclysm to what economic system to use in your new society in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科全书的易货卷。这本书包含了从什么样的物资在灾难后更值钱到在你们的新社会中使用什么样的经济体系的所有细节。作为基本模式，它跳过了理论，建议先进的同伴书的知识。

original: The bashing weapons volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from self defense with a pipe to the proper swinging technique for a sledge hammer in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的钝器篇，这本书包含了从挥舞铁管攻击到大锤重击技术的一切知识。

original:
The best defense is a good offense.

+1 Block attempts, damage blocked increased by 100%% of Intelligence.
Lasts 2 turns.
translation:
最好的防守是一个好的进攻。

+1次格挡尝试，格挡伤害增加100%%智力。
回合两次。

original: The companion book for the main  volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的游泳（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的游泳知识。

translation: 《重建文明百科全书》主要易货卷的配套书。这本书包含理论和更先进的，但不切实际的补充，以前的卷。

translation: 重建文明百科:口才，这本书包含了更高水平运用口才方面的理论知识。

original: The companion book for the main sub machineguns volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的冲锋枪（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的冲锋枪知识。

original: The companion book for the main tailoring volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的裁缝（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的裁缝知识。

original: The companion book for the main throwing volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的投掷（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的投掷知识。

original: The companion book for the main trapping volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的陷阱（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的陷阱知识。

original: The companion book for the main unarmed volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains theoretical and more advanced but impractical additions to the previous volume.
translation: 重建文明百科的徒手格斗（高级）篇，这本书包含了更高级的徒手格斗知识。

original: The computer volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from basic programing to cyber security algorithms in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的计算机篇，本书包含了从基本编程到网络安全算法的一切知识。

original: The cooking volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from cooking small game to basic chemistry in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科烹调篇，这本书包含了从烹饪知识到基础化学变化的一切知识。

original: The cutting weapons volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using a glass shiv to medieval swordsmanship in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的斩击武器篇，这本书包含了从玻璃刀使用到中世纪剑术的一切知识。

original: The directions on the map catch your interest.  You wonder if going there is a good idea.
translation: 地图上的说明引起你的兴趣，你想知道去那里是不是一个好主意

original: The dodging volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from dancing for beginners to parkour in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的闪避篇，这本书包含了从跳舞到跑酷的一切知识。

original: The driving volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from acquiring a driving license to professional racing in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的驾驶篇，这本书包含了从获得驾驶执照到专业赛车的一切知识。

original: The electronics volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from simple circuits to military robotics in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的电子学篇，这本书包含了从简单的电路到军用机器人的一切知识。

original: The fabrication volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from creating how to create simple stone tools to the creation of the pyramids of Egypt in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的制造篇，这本书包含了从如何创造简单的石器工具到建造埃及金字塔的一切知识。

original: The first aid volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from proper bandage application to exploratory surgery in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的急救篇，这本书包含了从合适的绷带应用到内科手术的一切知识。

original: The forge is on.  It is ready to use as indicated by the light.  Feed it more charcoal to keep it on.
translation: 锻造炉开了。如指示灯所示，可随时使用。多喂点木炭，让它保持健康。

original: The infantry of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of many augmented soldiers to be deployed into a battle field to ensure victory.  With range and melee capabilities, you engage enemies en masse.
translation: 你是超级士兵项目的步兵产物，你拥有优秀的射击和近战能力，与众多士兵一起被部署到战场之中以确保战斗的胜利。

original: The launchers volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from the use of spraycan flamethrowers to recoiless rifles in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的重武器篇，这本书包含了从火焰喷射器到无后座力火炮的一切知识。

original: The marksmanship volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from proper iron sight aiming to military sniper techniques in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的枪法篇，这本书包含了从机瞄到狙击技术的一切知识。

original: The mechanics volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from simple machines to the inner workings of submarine engines in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的机械学篇，这本书包含了从简单的机器到潜艇引擎内部细节的一切知识。

original: The melee combat volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using a branch to martial arts techniques in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的近战篇，这本书包含了从普通搏击到武术技巧的一切知识。

original: The pain in your muscles goes back to just a dull tension.
translation: 你肌肉的疼痛消减到一种隐隐作痛的状态

original: The piercing weapons volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using switchblades to spear combat in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的刺击武器篇，这本书包含了从使用刀片到长矛战斗的一切知识。

original: The pistols volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using zip pistols to laser pistols in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的手枪篇，本书包含了从普通手枪到激光手枪的一切知识。

original: The rifles volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using zip rifles to laser rifles in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的步枪篇，这本书包含了从普通步枪到激光步枪的一切知识。

original:
The shock and awe of combat gives you an opportunity to slip away.

+2 Block attempts, +2 Dodge attempts, movement speed increased by 100%% of Intelligence, moving generates 1/2 as much noise.
Last 6 turns.
translation:
战斗的震撼和敬畏给了你一个溜走的机会。

+2次格挡尝试，+2次躲闪尝试，移动速度增加100%%智力，移动产生1/2的噪音。
最近6回合。

original: The shotguns volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using zip shotguns to laser scatter guns in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的霰弹枪篇，这本书包含了从普通霰弹枪到激光霰弹枪的一切知识。

original: The sniper of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of a few augmented soldiers to be used for reconnaissance and V.I.P assassinations.  With your weapons and skills, you can eliminate key targets after living for weeks in enemy territory.
translation: 超级士兵项目的狙击手产物，你是参与侦察和特种作战的士兵之一，你可以在敌人的领地上生存下来并且能刺杀关键目标。

original: The speech volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from recruiting survivors to running for political office in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的口才篇，这本书包含了从招募幸存者到竞选政治职位的一切知识。

original: The sub machineguns volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from using makeshift smgs to automatic laser carbines in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的冲锋枪篇，这本书包含了从普通冲锋枪到自动激光冲锋枪的一切知识。

original: The super scout fires its rifle!
translation: 超级侦察兵丧尸的步枪开火了!

original: The super soldier fires its ARC rifle!
translation: 超级战士丧尸的步枪开火了。

original: The super soldier fires its LMG!
translation: 超级主宰丧尸的轻机枪开火了。

original: The super soldier fires its XARM scattergun!
translation: 超级战士丧尸的XARM霰弹枪开火了。

original: The super soldier fires its launcher!
translation: 超级主宰丧尸的重武器开火了!

original: The super soldier fires its pistol!
translation: 超级B.A.M.R.U丧尸的手枪开火了!

original: The super soldier fires its smg!
translation: 超级B.A.M.R.U丧尸的冲锋枪开火了!

original: The survival volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from camping to survival on a deserted island in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的生存篇，这本书包含了从露营到在荒岛上生存的一切知识。

original: The swimming volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from recreational swimming to crossing rivers in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的游泳篇，这本书包含了从休闲游泳到穿越河流的一切知识。

original: The tailoring volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from fixing clothing tears to fashion designing in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的裁缝篇，这本书包含了从服装款式到时装设计的一切知识。

original: The tank of the Super Soldier project.  You are one of a few augmented soldiers to be used as a heavy support to infantry.  With ranged, armor and regenerative capabilities, you can endure heavy damage and return it in kind.
translation: 超级士兵改造计划中的坦克产物，你是为数不多的重型作战步兵，拥有优秀的远程射击水准和高防护生存能力。你可以在承受巨大伤害后以同样的方式回赠敌人。

original: The tension in your body finally fades back to some degree of normalcy.
translation: 你身体里的紧张终于消退到了正常状态。

original: The throwing volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from throwing stones to spear hunting in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的投掷篇，这本书包含了从投掷圆石到鱼叉狩猎的一切知识。

original: The traps volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from spike pits to disarming landmines in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的陷阱篇，这本书包含了从埋设陷阱到解除地雷的一切知识。

original: The ultimate bionic mutant.  Only God knows why it exists.  With incredible power, armor and bionics on its side, victory won't come easy.
translation: 终极的仿生突变体，只有上帝才知道它的由来。拥有不可思议的力量，在强大的力量、装甲和仿生学的支持下，可以轻松获得战斗的胜利。

original: The unarmed volume of the Rebuilding Civilization encyclopedia.  This book contains everything from self defense techniques to MMA fighting in fine detail.  Being the basic model it skips over the theoretical, recommending the advanced companion book for that knowledge.
translation: 重建文明百科的徒手格斗篇，这本书包含了从防卫技巧到综合格斗的一切知识。

original: The unofficial expansion mod for Cataclysm: Dark Days Ahead.
translation: 大灾变 非官方拓展包

original: They didn't do a great job of covering their tracks.  I mean they really made me work for it, but with all the laboratories out there bits and pieces slipped through the gaps.
translation: 他们没有很好地掩盖自己的行踪。我的意思是他们真的让我为它工作，但由于所有的实验室都在那里零零碎碎地从缝隙中溜走。

original: They had me set up and ready to follow a paper trail, check up on a small handful of lab projects.  Degree in computer engineering and a brief stint as an officer candidate before all this.
translation: 他们把我安排好，准备跟踪记录，检查一些实验室项目。计算机工程学位，在此之前有短暂的军官候选人经历。

original: This DNA marker serves as a reminder of what you are - a Bio-Weapon.  This is for NPCs, if you have this it's a bug to pester Noctifer about!
translation: 这个DNA标记可以提醒你你是一个生物武器，这是给npc的，如果你有的话，这是一个bug！！

original: This DNA marker serves as a reminder of what you are - another failure in this world.  It identifies you as a Failed Bio-Weapon.
translation: 这个DNA标记可以提醒你是一次失败的生物武器。

original: This NPC could tell you about how they survived the Cataclysm
translation: 这个NPC可以告诉你他们是如何在大灾难中幸存下来的

original: This a refuge for the former scientists of the Bio-Weapon Project.  We settled here in the woods and tried to make a living.  We allow people to stay here, as long as they contribute something.  We even managed to find a couple of stray Bio-Weapons!
translation: 这是生物武器项目前科学家的避难所。我们在树林里定居下来，试图谋生。我们允许人们留在这里，只要他们有所贡献。我们甚至设法找到了几个流浪的生物武器！

original: This creates the effect that heals the caster.
translation: 治疗施法者的效果

original: This exists only to trigger on-self effects from an on-hit action.
translation: 这只会在命中动作的自我效果中触发。

original: This implant provides an experimental military hydrogen cell, able to produce large spikes of power for intense usage.  Its network of pressurized storage can hold 500 ml of hydrogen gas, or denser hydrogen canisters used in plasma weaponry.  The label advises not to use it in confined spaces, and to keep moving if used during a military operation, due to hazardous levels of waste heat.
translation: 这种植入体提供了一个实验性的军用氢电池，能够以高峰值功率发电用于高强度使用。它的加压储存网络可以储存500毫升氢气，或者等离子武器中使用的密度更高的氢气罐。建议不要在狭窄的空间里使用它，如果在军事行动中使用，由于发热严重，要注意保持移动散热。

original: This is a DNA marker identifying you as part of the Super Soldier Project.  It was used to give you clearances to biometric scanners and special weapons but now a days it seems useless.
translation: 这是一个DNA标记，它曾被用来为你提供生物特征扫描仪和特殊武器的许可证，但现在它似乎已经没用了。

original: This is a booklet dealing the instructions on how to convert an Omnitech laser weapon from using atomic batteries to use UPS power.  If you can find one of the kits mentioned, you could replicate the steps on this booklet.
translation: 这是一本小册子，讲述了如何将激光武器从使用钚燃料电池转换为使用UPS形式的说明。如果你能找到里面提到的工具包，你就可以按照这本小册子上的步骤操作，改造武器。

original: This is a bug, report to Noctifer if you see this.
translation: 这是一个错误，如果你看到这个报告Noctifer。

original: This is a bulky electronic wrist mounted tool, designed to provide an accurate topographical map of your surroundings when used.  It also comes with digital clock and alarm features.  The battery is integral to the device, and requires sunlight or a recharging station to charge.
translation: 这是一个电子侦察平板，使用太阳能/充电电池供电，可以装在手腕上，用来提供精确的地形地图。它还配有数字时钟和闹钟功能。

original: This is a crudely made electric firestarter modded to recharge in the sun, which can function as an inefficient lighter.
translation: 一个简易的电动点火器，它可以在阳光下充电。这可以作为一个低效率的打火机使用。

original: This is a hammer molded from cast iron.  While a bit brittle if extensively used for combat, it holds up well enough to serve as a tool, though lacks enough of a claw to pry with.
translation: 这是一把铸铁锤。虽用于战斗时有点脆弱，但它可以很好地作为一种工具，虽然缺乏足够的爪撬。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps for wearing.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged.  The battery is soldiered in place, and will require sunlight or a recharging station to recharge.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒。如果电量充足, 打开手电筒将会提供照明。电池焊接在手电筒里，需要阳光或充电站充电。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight with straps to wear.  The flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这是一把LED重型太阳能手电筒，手电筒已经打开了，将会不断消耗电力。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  This flashlight is turned on, and continually draining its batteries.  Use it to turn it off.
translation: 这是一把LED重型太阳能手电筒，手电筒已经打开了，将会不断消耗电力。

original: This is a heavy duty LED solar flashlight.  Using this flashlight will turn it on and provide light, assuming it is charged.  The battery is soldered in place, and requires sunlight or a recharging station to charge.
translation: 这是一个重型LED太阳能手电筒。如果电量充足, 打开手电筒将会提供照明。电池焊接在手电筒里，需要阳光或充电站充电。

original: This is a hefty prying tool, molded from cast iron.  A bit brittle and heavy to be extensively used as a weapon, but adequate for prying open locked doors.  Not exactly ideal, but it's an improvement over makeshift tools.
translation: 这是一种用铸铁铸成的重型撬撬工具。有点脆弱和沉重，广泛用作武器，但足以撬开锁着的门。虽然不是很理想，但这是对自制工具的改进.

original: This is a homemade power cell made from household batteries along with a series of capacitors, designed to translate mechanical force into enough voltage to more efficiently power a survivor's crank rifle.  It's a wonder this thing isn't an electrocution hazard.
translation: 这是一个自制的动力电池，由家用电池和一系列电容器组成，宗旨在将普通电压转化为足够高的电压，从而更有效地为幸存者的曲柄步枪提供动力。体积更大，不太可靠，奇怪的是，这东西没有触电的危险。

original: This is a journal with what seems to be an invitation of some sort from some unknown organization.  While its contents rather boring to read, some bits offer promises of 'forbidden knowledge' and that said contents are 'just a taste of true power'…  Science has definitely gone too far…
translation: 这是一本杂志，好像是来自某个未知组织的邀请。虽然它的内容读起来相当无聊，但承诺会提供“被禁止的知识”，并说内容是“真正权力的味道”……科学已经走得太远了……

original: This is a makeshift mold made from plastic.  It could be shaped and used to craft items made of metal.
translation: 这个是塑料做的。它可以成形并用于制作金属制品。

original: This is a map made by a former scientist of the Bio-Weapon project.  It marks the location of an abandoned laboratory, where a great enemy resides.
translation: 这是前生物武器项目科学家绘制的地图。它标记了一个废弃实验室的位置，那里有一个巨大的敌人。

original: This is a modified double-barreled ARC rifle, designed by Omnitech Labs.  Gains an EMP effect at the cost of range and firepower, relying on atomic cells instead of a UPS hookup.  It is fired in short pulses that act like buckshot; still decent against conventional threats but best against electronics.
translation: 这是一种改进的双管电弧步枪，由Omnitech实验室设计。以射程和火力为代价获得EMP效果。它以短距离脉冲形式发射，就像霰弹一样;对付普通的威胁还不错，相对而言对付机械类敌人效果最好。

original: This is a modified double-barreled ARC rifle, designed by Omnitech Labs.  Gains an EMP effect at the cost of range and firepower.  It is fired in short pulses that act like buckshot; still decent against conventional threats but best against electronics.  This one has been converted to use UPS as its fuel source.
translation: 这是一种改进的双管电弧步枪，由Omnitech实验室设计。以牺牲射程和火力为代价获得EMP效果。它以短距离脉冲形式发射，就像霰弹一样;对付普通的威胁还不错，相对而言对付机械类敌人效果最好，使用UPS供能。

original: This is a portable forge with improvised air intake and insulating lining.  It can be used for light metalworking, repairing items, and reheating food, but its utility is limited by its small size and capacity.
translation: 这是一个便携式锻炉，有临时的进气口和隔热衬里。它可用于轻金属加工和食品的再加热，但由于体积小、容量小，其实用性受到限制。

original: This is a sharp knife molded from cast iron.  A bit brittle and heavy to be extensively used as a weapon, but adequate as a cutting tool.  Works better than sharpening any old metal, at least.
translation: 这是一把用铸铁铸成的锋利的刀。有一点脆和重，可广泛用作武器，但作为切削工具是足够的。至少比打磨任何旧金属都有效。

original: This is a shovel molded out of cast iron.  Rather heavy and brittle, but does its job at least.
translation: 这是一个用铸铁铸造而成的铲子。相当重而脆，但至少可以起作用。

original: This is a tank of compressed hydrogen gas.  If you need to make water from scratch, or lift a zeppelin, it could come in handy.
translation: 这是一罐压缩氢气。如果你需要从头开始制造水，或者举起齐柏林飞艇，它会派上用场的。

original: This is an axe molded from cast iron.  Stands up well enough if used as intended, but is too heavy and brittle to make a good weapon.
translation: 这是一个由铸铁模制而成的斧头，它足够坚固，但是太重而且太脆所以并不是很好的武器。

original: This is an inactive laser turret.  Using this item involves turning it on and placing it on the ground, where it will attach itself.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the turret will identify you as a friendly, and attack all enemies with its revolving laser cannons.  It requires sunlight in order to fire.
translation: 这是一个未激活的激光炮塔。使用这个物品把它激活并放在地面上，它会将自己固定在地面上。如果重新编程并成功布线，炮塔会将你识别为友军，并用旋转激光炮攻击所有敌人。它需要在阳光照亮下才能开火。

original: This oversized pressure cooker uses diesel or other readily-available fuels to power a high-pressure sterilization chamber.  Less efficient than a commercial battery-powered autoclave and incompatible with a vehicle power grid, it does the job if nothing else is available.
translation: 这个超大的高压锅使用柴油或其他现成的燃料来驱动高压灭菌室。效率低于商用电池驱动的高压灭菌器，并且与车辆电网不兼容，如果没有其他东西可用，它也能工作。

original: This… thing is a failed experiment of science, whose biology has been overtaken by the fungus.  Has various enhancements, both mutagenic and bionic, that it uses to serve its new overlord(s).
translation: 这个…这是一个失败的科学实验，它的生物学已经被真菌所取代。它有各种各样的增强，包括突变的和仿生的，用来为它的新主人服务。

original: Those are words you don't hear from just any random punk.  Makes me feel like this planet isn't quite circling the drain just yet.  Fuck it, why not?  I'm ready if you are.
translation: 这些话不是随便说说的，我觉得这颗星球还没完蛋，为什么不去呢？你准备好了吗？如果你准备好了，我也准备好了。.

original: Those augmented abominations, the notes I found tied them to a thing called the Bio-Weapon Project.  You look like you're in the same shape as them, though you're not trying to kill me at least.  Can I trust you?
translation: 生物武器，至少他们看起来是这样的。事实上，你看起来和他们一样。尽管目前你还没有尝试杀掉我，但是我能相信你吗？

original: Thought you'd know from the badge you're wearing.  They've got augs like I do, but also some mutations and other changes to make them perform better as soldiers.  Living weapons, basically.  Whatever you ran into out there, don't worry.  We're all on the same side here, for all their enhancements they act more like two bored teenagers than military experiments.
translation: 我还以为你会从你戴的徽章上知道呢。他们和我一样有Augs，但也有一些变异和其他改变使他们在作为士兵时表现得更好。他们是活武器。不管你在外面遇到什么，别担心。我们都站在同一边，尽管他们的能力增强了，但他们的行为更像两个无聊的青少年，而不是军事实验体。

original: Throughly poring over the map, you memorize the location.
translation: 通过仔细看地图，你记住了位置。

original: Time, effort, and the fact that all these government projects can only do so much to cover their tracks.  Eventually I had enough to go on and just barely enough time to follow what information I had.
translation: 时间，努力，以及事实，所有这些政府项目只能做这么多来掩盖他们的踪迹。最终，我有足够的时间继续下去，只是几乎没有足够的时间去了解我所掌握的信息。

original: Topographical Scan
translation: 地形扫描

original: Two makeshift blades with knuckle guards that double as a tazer.  Has a wrap on the handle to prevent self shock.
translation: 两把泰瑟刀刃，手柄上的保护层防止误伤自己。

original: Used to be an old lab bunker.  We had the lower level gutted and remodeled to make it livable.  Better than nothing at least.
translation: 曾经是一个旧的实验室地堡。我们对地下层进行了拆除和改造，使其适合居住。至少比什么都没有好。

original: Vented waste heat.
translation: 排出余热。

original: Version of the AKRO-388 for use by monsters.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的AKRO-388版。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug。

original: Version of the ARC-314 for use by monsters.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的ARC-314版。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug!

original: Version of the KRX-108 for use by monsters, to account for increased accuracy of ranged attacks.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的KRX-108版，用于提高远程攻击的准确性。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug!

original: Version of the MK-2 for use by monsters, to account for increased accuracy of ranged attacks.  Copies from MX-84 instead because for some wacky reason the MK2 itself doesn't work right in the hands of monsters.  Unlike the others, overriding the damage type doesn't matter because it you take a direct heat, being lit on fire from heat damagetype is the least of your worries.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的MK-2版，用于提高远程攻击的准确性。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug!

original: Version of the MX-84 for use by monsters, to account for increased accuracy of ranged attacks.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的MX-84版，用于提高远程攻击的准确性。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug!

original: Version of the NEO-33 for use by monsters, with explicit overrides to ensure that it won't light players on fire.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的NEO-33版。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug。

original: Version of the XARM-37 for use by monsters.  This is a bug if you find one of these!
translation: 供怪物使用的XARM-37版，用于提高远程攻击的准确性。如果你发现了这个，那么这是一个bug!

original: Was it that hectic to begin with?
translation: 一开始有那么忙吗？

original: We'll see what I can do.
translation: 我们看看我能做些什么。

original: We'll see.
translation: 我们拭目以待。

original: We're Bio-Weapons.  We're meant to be out there, kicking ass, taking names, and saving the world.  Why not come along and do exactly that?
translation: 我们是生物武器，我们注定要出去拯救世界的，为什么不一起来呢？

original: Welcome.  Try not to cause any trouble and things will be just fine.
translation: 欢迎光临。尽量不要惹麻烦，事情会好起来的。

original: Well I'll be damned!  How do I know you didn't just find that somewhere?  Oh well, it doesn't really matter. The fact that you have it means you at least met one.  If you need anything, I can help you out.
translation: 这真是该死的，我怎么知道你不是在某个地方捡起来的？哦，好吧，没关系。你拥有它意味着你至少见过一个。如果你需要什么，我可以帮你。

original: Well I'll be damned.  At this rate I was starting to think we'd just wait for that thing to come find us.  And with one of ours leading the charge, even.  Assuming you've earned that badge, at least.  I'm with you.
translation: 该死的。照这样下去，我开始觉得我们只能等那东西来找我们了。其中一个甚至是我们的主管。至少，假设你已经赢得了那枚徽章。我会和你一起。

original: Well, I was starting to think I'd never get to join the hunt.  If you've got what it takes, we might come out of it in one piece.  I'm with you.
translation: 嗯，我开始觉得我永远也不能加入到狩猎中来了。如果你具备所需的条件，我们可能会安然无恙。我支持你。

original: Well, bye.
translation: 好吧,再见。

original: Well, damn.
translation: 好吧，该死。

original: Well, the main reason we are hiding here is Apophis…  It is a Bio-Weapon specifically designed to eliminate every other Bio-Weapon and Bio-Weapon scientist.  Currently we don't have anything that could stand a decent chance against it, so we're trying to create our own Bio-Weapon to counter Apophis. Sigma and Lambda have expressed interest in going after it, but they won't be able to take it out on their own.
translation: 好吧，我们藏在这里的主要原因是阿波菲斯..它是一种专门用于消灭其他生物武器和生物武器科学家的生物武器。目前我们没有任何可以打败它的好办法，所以我们正试图创造我们自己的生物武器来对抗阿波菲斯。西格玛和兰姆达表示有兴趣去追杀它，但他们无法自己击败它。

original: Well, the main reason we were hiding here was Apophis…  It was a Bio-Weapon specifically designed to eliminate every other Bio-Weapon and Bio-Weapon scientist.  Now we can try to get things fixed up eventually, and work on research that might benefit others out there.
translation: 好吧，我们藏在这里的主要原因是阿波菲斯..它是一种专门用于消灭其他生物武器和生物武器科学家的生物武器。现在我们可以尝试最终解决问题，并致力于那些可能使其他人受益的研究。

original: Well, then what are you doing here?  Did you stumble into this place by accident?  You still seem to handle yourself pretty well.
translation: 那你来这干嘛?你是偶然来到这个地方的吗?你似乎还能很好地控制自己。

original: Well, you know that badge you're wearing?  They're linked to those augmented abominations, the old lab sites called it the Bio-Weapon Project, or Project Mesektet.  I'd like to ask first, how you got your hands on it.  I have some rather dangerous work that needs to be done, but I need confirmation that you can handle it.
translation: 你知道你戴的是生物武器徽章吗？我想先问一下，你是怎么拿到的。我有一些相当危险的工作需要你完成，但我需要你能确认一下。

original: Well, you've most likely learned by now how dangerous those things can be.  If you're able to handle yourself well enough out there to get your hands on something like that, then hopefully you can be trusted with more dangerous work.  I have something I'd like to ask of you, when you get the chance.
translation: 你现在很可能已经知道这些东西有多危险了。如果你能很好地控制自己，去做类似的事情，那么希望你能被信任去做更危险的工作。当你有机会的时候，我有件事想问你。

original: What are those things?
translation: 那些东西是什么？

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这里干什么？

original: What are you doing?
translation: 你在做什么？

original: What exactly is Apophis and is it really that dangerous?
translation: 阿波菲斯到底是什么，真的那么危险吗?

original: What happened?
translation: 怎么搞的？

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: What should we do?
translation: 我们该怎么办？

original: What's going on out here?
translation: 外面发生了什么事？

original: What's going on?
translation: 发生什么事？

original: What's with the badge?  A Bio-Weapon, it says?
translation: 你是生物武器？

original: What, like going out there, killing zombies, protecting the innocent?  Is that what the sappy motivational speech is for?  Well, reject or not, I see that same fire in your eye that any bio-weapon has.  I think you've got a point.  Let's see where this goes.
translation: 什么，比如出去杀僵尸，保护无辜?这就是那篇煽情的励志演讲的目的吗?不管你拒绝与否，我都能在你的眼睛里看到任何生物武器都有的那种火焰。我想你说得有道理。让我们看看会发生什么。

original: Whatever it is, I really don't care.
translation: 好吧, 怎样都好, 我真的不在乎

original: Who are these Bio-Weapons here?
translation: 这些生物武器是谁？

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Why are the others attacking us?
translation: 为什么其他人要攻击我们?

original: Why not join me?
translation: 为什么不加入我呢？

original: Will do.
translation: 我会的。

original: With the power per shot of the ARC and the firerate of the AKRO, Omnitech Labs' KRX-108 was made to overwhelm enemies with supreme firepower.  While not very energy-efficient, this behemoth can deal a devastating blow to large groups of enemies, but each pulse draws heavily from a proprietary atomic battery connection.  If attached to a vehicle mount, it can also make full use of its otherwise-limited automated targeting.
translation: Omnitech实验室生产的强大火力轻机枪，它可以对一大群敌人造成毁灭性的打击。如果安装在车辆上，它还可以充分利用其自动定位功能自动攻击敌人。

original: With the power per shot of the ARC and the firerate of the AKRO, Omnitech Labs' KRX-108 was made to overwhelm enemies with supreme firepower.  While not very energy-efficient, this behemoth can deal a devastating blow to large groups of enemies.  If attached to a vehicle mount, it can also make full use of its otherwise-limited automated targeting.  This one has been converted to use UPS as its fuel source.
translation: Omnitech实验室生产的强大火力轻机枪，它可以对一大群敌人造成毁灭性的打击。如果安装在车辆上，它还可以充分利用其自动定位功能自动攻击敌人，使用UPS供能。

original: Women's underwear that covers a little less than normal in exchange for stares.
translation: 女人的内衣，比平长内衣更小，以换取老司机的凝视。

original: XARM-37 Pulse Scatter Gun
translation: XARM-37脉冲霰弹枪（UPS）

original: Yeah, I am one of them.
translation: 是的，我就是其中之一.

original: Yeah, I don't think so.
translation: 是啊，我不这么认为。

original: Yeah, same augmentation project your badge labels you as, assuming that belongs to you.  Router found me passed out and told me about everything.  I don't remember anything before that.  Guess I just have to trust him for now.
translation: 是的。鲁特发现我昏倒了，把一切都告诉了我。在那之前我什么都不记得了。我想我现在只能相信他。

original: You already asked me about it not that long ago.  I'd really prefer not to discuss it.
translation: 不久前你已经问过我这个问题了。我真的不想讨论它。

original: You are not human.  You can't even remember anymore, whether you were ever human to begin with.  What matters is that now, you are more than human.
translation: 你不是人类, 你几乎什么都不记得了, 不过这不重要，重要的是：现在的你比其他'人'更加像是一个人。

original: You can currently see through walls.  The rads this thing is giving off probably isn't good for you, by the way.
translation: 实验性护目镜，发射伽玛辐射，让视线穿过墙壁。由于辐射中毒的危险，不推荐长时间使用。

original: You catch %s's attack, and send them staggering back
translation: 你抓住了%s的攻击，然后把他猛力打退

original: You dodge and send %s tumbling to the ground
translation: 你躲闪并让%s摔倒在地

original: You don't recognize this aug configuration, Hunter?
translation: 你压根不了解这个AUG设置, 对吧？猎人。

original: You fake a strike at %s
translation: 你在%s假装进攻

original: You feel worn out and empty inside.
translation: 你感到身心疲惫，内心空虚。

original: You found your comrades and regrouped in hell.
translation: 你找到了你的战友，在地狱里重新集结。

original: You have become good at using improvised and hand made weaponry, and to a lesser extent your fists.  You start with the Survivor Combatives style.
translation: 你非常擅长制作手工武器，各种手工制作的即兴武器让你开始创造属于自己的战斗风格。

original: You have been augmented with many 'passive' combat bionics, they merely aid you but are not weapons in and of themselves. You have been trained to use all sorts of different weapons, including your fists. You can pretty much weaponize a sock.
translation: 你被植入了许多强化身体的仿生插件，他们可以帮助你增强战斗能力。你被训练使用各种不同的武器进行战斗，除开你的拳头以外，你甚至可以使用一只袜子。

original: You have that badge, you should know how powerful those things are.  Apophis could take them all at once.  Have you seen a zombie hulk?  They couldn't even scratch it.  Worse still, there are some rejects from the Bio-Weapon program that have sided with him, the abominations as they've come to be known.  This is why we are hiding here.
translation: 你有那个徽章，那你应该知道那些东西有多强大。阿波菲斯可以一次把它们全部击败。你见过丧尸浩克吗？他们甚至无法伤害阿波菲斯。更糟糕的是，一些生物武器项目的拒绝者站在了他一边。这就是为什么我们躲在这里。

original: You have transcended your humanity in both mind and body; your biology freed from the shackles of living flesh.  Now a warrior with battle running through your veins, you are what humanity would consider the next step in evolution.
translation: 你已经在思想和身体上超越了你的人性；你的生物体从活生生的肉体的枷锁中解脱出来。现在你是一个战士，你的血管里流淌着战斗，你就是人类将要考虑的下一步进化。

original: You hold the scout's tool up, and what appears to be a bolt of plasma fires upwards like a flare, the device's display soon displaying information on the surrounding area.
translation: 你举着侦察工具，一束等离子像耀斑一样向上发射，设备的显示屏很快就显示了周围区域的信息。

original: You just asked me earlier.  I'd rather not talk about it right now.
translation: 你刚才问我了。我现在不想谈这个。

original: You just asked me not that long ago.  I'd rather not deal with this at the moment.
translation: 你不久前才问过我。我现在不想处理这事。

original: You just asked me that.
translation: 你刚刚问了我这个问题。

original: You knew something was coming, you prepared, when the dead rose, you knew what to do. With your house now barricaded, it's time to put your plan into action.
translation: 你知道有什么事情正在发生，你准备好了。当死亡降临时，你知道该做什么。现在你已经封锁了你的房子，是时候把你的计划付诸行动了。

original: You knock %s's weapon away
translation: 你打掉了%s的武器

original: You know, I like the sound of that.  This is what we were made for.  Lead the way.
translation: 你知道，我喜欢听你这么说。这就是咱们的目的。带路吧。

original: You learned how to handle yourself in the cataclysm.  Whether armed or unarmed, you know how to use your wits to stay alive.  Survival is of the highest priority.
translation: 你学会了如何应对灾难中的危机，你很擅长使用自制武器来进行战斗，偶尔还使用你的拳头。虽然幸存者格斗术并不华丽，但它能让你活下去。

original: You read the back of the note and plan your next move.
translation: 你研究了便条的背面备注，并开始计划下一步行动。

original: You read the map.  You gulp and realize what must be done…
translation: 看完地图后，你吸了一口凉气，意识到必须做些什么......

original: You seem like a capable person, so you might have a chance.  We have pieced together the coordinates to the laboratory Apophis uses as its base.  I want you to take it down, rid the world of Apophis!  That lab has a lot of valuable equipment left inside; if you manage to kill that thing, it's all yours.  I wish we could do it ourselves, but between the portal breakthroughs, the bombs and the undead, the chance has been lost.
translation: 你看起来是一个非常有能力的人，所以你可能有机会帮我。我们把阿波菲斯试验的坐标给整理了出来。我们要你去到那里，除掉阿波菲斯。那间实验室还拥有很多珍贵的设备。如果你能杀死阿波菲斯，那么那些东西都将是属于你的。虽然我们希望自己去完成，但是因为一些原因，我们已经不能自己去完成这件事情了。

original: You seem rather well-equipped for a mere hacker.
translation: 对于一名黑客来说，你的装备似乎非常精良。

original: You seem to know a lot more than you're letting on.
translation: 你好像知道的比你说的要多。

original: You start with the Bionic Combatives style.  A modern combat style for the post-modern human.  Nicknamed "Biojutsu", Bionic Combatives combines integrated weaponry, armor and augments into an consolidated fighting discipline.
translation: 你综合了武器、装甲和生化插件结合成一个统一的格斗风格。你将它称之为生化格斗术。

original: You steady yourself, prepared for the fights ahead.
translation: 保持冷静，为即将到来的战斗做好准备。

original: You thirst for blood!
translation: 你渴望鲜血！

original: You want the grand tour, ask the guard that's usually lounging around in the rec room, downstairs.  My duty's up here, and there's not much to see topside.  Just some fields tilled and a shed for storage.  All the interesting stuff is downstairs.
translation: 想要参观的话，去问问经常在楼下娱乐室闲逛的警卫。我的职责在这里，上面没有什么好看的。只是一些耕地和一个仓库。所有有趣的东西都在楼下。

original: You were a very busy person. That's why you bought a can of survival items and called it a day. Now it's the only thing you have.
translation: 你是个很忙的人。这就是为什么你买了一罐生存物品然后就收工了。现在这是你唯一拥有的东西。

original: You were augmented with a blade, and enhancements to your speed and reaction time. You can hit an opponent multiple times before they land a blow.
translation: 你被植入仿生刀片以及增强的速度和反应能力的生化插件，因此你可以在对手攻击你之前多次暴打敌人。

original: You were augmented with electrical generators and protection from them. You hit multiple foes with electricity, frying them until their nervous system gives up.
translation: 你拥有电击能力，可以使用电力同时攻击多个敌人，直到电到他们的神经系统崩溃。

original: You were augmented with some claws, and enhancements to your reflexes. You deliver a powerful strike that neutralizes foes in few hits.
translation: 你被植入仿生利爪，还有增强的速度和反应能力，你可以在对手攻击你之前直接撕碎敌人。

original: You were kidnapped and forced into an underground blood sport, augmented and forced to fight others like you for the amusement of wealthy clients.  You may not be the only one lucky enough to have survived that without being broken.
translation: 你被绑架并且强制要求参与一个取悦富豪们的血腥地下格斗场, 很庆幸, 你不是唯一一个被四分五裂的幸存者。

original: You were paranoid about the world ending so you jumped on the prepper bandwagon. You read a book on survival and got yourself a gun pack and some gear. The cataclysm was not what you expected.
translation: 你对世界末日有些偏执，所以你加入了准备者的行列。你读了一本关于生存的书，买了一把枪和一些装备。这种大灾难并不是你所期望的。

original: You were part of a an advanced infantry unit, deployed to one of several 'priority sites' as part of a last-ditch effort to get the situation under control.  Delays and casualties led to you being the only one left by the time you reached the objective, and things aren't looking any better.
translation: 你是高级步兵部队的一员，该部队被部署到几个优先地点之一，以尽一切努力使局势得到控制。 延误和人员伤亡导致你在达到目的地时仅剩一个人，而且情况并没有好转

original: You woke up, where are you?  Who are you?  What are you?!  That doesn't matter right now... you have a bad feeling...
translation: 你醒来，你在哪里？你是谁？你是什么？！现在没关系了……你有一种不好的感觉……

original: You're kidding, right?  You really don't know?  Is that badge actually yours…? Maybe that mindwipe rumor was true after all…
translation: 你在开玩笑,对吧?你真的不知道?那个徽章是你的吗?也许那个人的谣言是真的……

original: You're left reeling as the chemicals make your biology reach new heights.
translation: 当化学物质使你的生物学达到新的高度时，你会感到头晕目眩。

original: You're one of the original models.  Wouldn't mind having you on the team.
translation: 你是最初的模型之一。我不介意你加入我们的团队。

original: You're right.  I'd rather not talk too much about the details, but I'm on a mission to find out what happened and get in touch with anyone still alive.
translation: 你是对的。我不想谈太多细节，但我的任务是查明发生了什么，并与任何活着的人取得联系。

original: You're sure about this?  Thank you… that means a lot, you know.  Be sure to bring some proof, be creative.  I'll be waiting for your return.  I'd suggest talking to Sigma and Lambda too, before you leave.
translation: 你确定吗？谢谢你，这意味着很多。当然，你一定要带些证据回来证明你除掉了阿波菲斯。我们等你回来，在你离开之前，我建议你去和西格玛和兰姆达谈谈。

original: You've got guts, suggesting I follow along just out of boredom.  You seem competent enough at least, so why not… lead on!
translation: 你很有勇气，虽然我觉得无聊，但是我还是决定跟随你，带路吧。

original: You've got the badge, huh?  I am listening.
translation: 你有徽章，是吗?我在听。

original: Your bloodlust wears off.  You feel AWFUL!
translation: 你的嗜血欲望消失了。你感觉糟透了！

original: Your body has been implanted with a compact, advanced plutonium-cell generator for military use.  A true atomic battery, using advanced materials to create a practical alphavoltaic power source.  While its power output is still very low, it's also consistent with negligible waste heat, making it a useful backup to another power generation method.  It will produce power continuously unless interrupted by the integral disconnect switch.
translation: 你的身体被植入了一个小型的先进钚电池发生器，用于军事用途。  一个真正意义上的原子电池，利用先进的材料，创造一个实用的阿尔法电源。虽然它的功率输出仍然很低，但它的余热也可以忽略不计，这使得它成为另一种发电方法的有用备份形式。它将持续产生电力，除非中断由整体断开开关。

original: Your dexterity has been greatly increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural agility.  Dexterity +8.
translation: 相对于你天生的敏捷性，你的灵巧性已经被你的身体改变大大提高了。灵巧+8。

original: Your dexterity has been increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural agility.  Dexterity +6.
translation: 相对于你天生的敏捷性，你的灵巧性已经被你的身体改变所提高。灵巧+6。

original: Your dexterity has been increased slightly by your physical alterations, relative to your natural agility.  Dexterity +2.
translation: 相对于你天生的敏捷性，你的灵巧性已经被你的身体改变稍微提高了。灵巧+2。

original: Your dexterity has been increased somewhat by your physical alterations, relative to your natural agility.  Dexterity +4.
translation: 相对于你天生的敏捷性，你的灵巧性在一定程度上是由你的身体变化而提高的。灵巧+4。

original: Your dexterity has been massively increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural agility.  Dexterity +10.
translation: 相对于你天生的敏捷性，你的敏捷性已经被你的身体改变大大提高了。灵巧+10。

original: Your equipment is actively eliminating the sounds of your footsteps.
translation: 一种实验性鞋子，可以完全让你的走动不发出声响，但同时会减慢你的行动速度。

original: Your genome is unique to you, this is a DNA marker identifying you as Bio-Weapon Alpha.  It may prove useful one day.
translation: 你的基因组是独一无二的，这是一个DNA标记,鉴定你是生物武器-阿尔法。也许有一天会有用的。

original: Your genome is unique to you, this is a DNA marker identifying you as Bio-Weapon Beta.  It may prove useful one day.
translation: 你的基因组是独一无二的，这是一个DNA标记。鉴定你是生物武器-贝塔，也许有一天会有用的。

original: Your genome is unique to you, this is a DNA marker identifying you as Bio-Weapon Delta.  It may prove useful one day.
translation: 你的基因组是独一无二的，这是一个DNA标记，鉴定你是生物武器-德尔塔，也许有一天会有用的。

original: Your genome is unique to you, this is a DNA marker identifying you as Bio-Weapon Gamma.  It may prove useful one day.
translation: 你的基因组是独一无二的，这是一个DNA标记，鉴定你是生物武器-伽玛，也许有一天会有用的。

original: Your heart feels like it's going a mile a minute, and every muscle in your body is sore.
translation: 你的心脏感觉像每分钟走一英里，你身体的每一块肌肉都在酸痛。.

original: Your intelligence has been greatly increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural neurology.  Intelligence +8.
translation: 相对于你天生的神经学，你的智力已经被你的心理改变大大提高了。智力+8。

original: Your intelligence has been increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural neurology.  Intelligence +6.
translation: 相对于你天生的神经学，你的智力已经因为你的心理改变而提高了。智力+6。

original: Your intelligence has been increased slightly by your mental alterations, relative to your natural neurology.  Intelligence +2.
translation: 相对于你天生的神经学，你的智力因你的心理改变而略有提高。智力+2。

original: Your intelligence has been increased somewhat by your mental alterations, relative to your natural neurology.  Intelligence +4.
translation: 相对于你天生的神经学，你的智力由于你的心理改变而有所提高。智力+4。

original: Your intelligence has been massively increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural neurology.  Intelligence +10.
translation: 相对于你天生的神经学，你的智力已经被你的心理改变大大提高了。智力+10。

original: Your left arm has been outfitted with a complex array of rotating laser projectors.  Or in layman's terms, a laser gatling gun!  You may use your energy banks to fire a barrage of lasers.
translation: 你的左臂已经装备了一组激光加特林步枪！可以用你的能量库发射一连串的激光。

original: Your left arm is currently transformed into a ups powered laser gatling gun.  Fire it as if it was any other gun.
translation: 你的左臂现在变成了ups供能的激光加特林枪。可以像其他枪一样开火。

original: Your mental genetic conditioning has reached its peak, beyond all human limits.  You don't mind the rain as much and you need less sleep.  You've also developed an immunity to various mind-altering and neurological effects.
translation: 你的心理遗传条件已经达到了顶峰，超越了所有人类的极限。你不介意下雨那么多，你需要更少的睡眠。你也对各种精神改变和神经影响产生了免疫力。

original: Your muscles feel abnormally tense and it's hard to sit still.
translation: 你的肌肉感到异常紧绷，很难坐着不动。

original: Your perception has been greatly increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural alertness.  Perception +8.
translation: 相对于你天生的机敏，你的感知能力已经被你的心智改变大大提高了。感知+8。

original: Your perception has been increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural alertness.  Perception +6.
translation: 相对于你天生的机敏，你的感知能力已经被你的心智改变所增强。感知+6。

original: Your perception has been increased slightly by your mental alterations, relative to your natural alertness.  Perception +2.
translation: 相对于你天生的机敏，你的感知能力由于你的心理改变而略微增加。感知+2。

original: Your perception has been increased somewhat by your mental alterations, relative to your natural alertness.  Perception +4.
translation: 相对于你天生的机敏，你的感知能力由于你的心理改变而有所提高。感知+4。

original: Your perception has been massively increased by your mental alterations, relative to your natural alertness.  Perception +10.
translation: 相对于你天生的机敏，你的感知能力已经被你的心理改变大大提高了。感知+10。

original: Your physical genetic conditioning has reached its peak, beyond all human limits.  Your body is hardened against physical damage slightly and your figure is more intimating, but you've also developed an immunity to most toxins, as well as depressant and painkilling drugs.  Your metabolism also processes radioactive contaminants faster, and you recover from pain quickly.
translation: 你的身体遗传条件已经达到了顶峰，超越了所有人类的极限。你的身体对身体的伤害有轻微的抵抗力，你的体形更具亲和力，但你也对大多数毒素以及镇静剂和止痛药产生了免疫力。你的新陈代谢也会更快地处理放射性污染物，你会很快从疼痛中恢复过来。

original: Your strength has been greatly increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural physique.  Strength +8.
translation: 你的力量已经大大增加了你的身体改变，相对于你的自然体质。臂力+8。

original: Your strength has been increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural physique.  Strength +6.
translation: 相对于你的自然体格，你的力量因你的身体变化而增加。臂力+6。

original: Your strength has been increased slightly by your physical alterations, relative to your natural physique.  Strength +2.
translation: 相对于你的自然体格，你的力量已经被你的身体改变稍微增加了。臂力+2。

original: Your strength has been increased somewhat by your physical alterations, relative to your natural physique.  Strength +4.
translation: 相对于你的自然体格，你的体力已经因为你的身体变化而有所增加。臂力+4。

original: Your strength has been massively increased by your physical alterations, relative to your natural physique.  Strength +10.
translation: 相对于你的自然体格，你的力量已经被你的身体改变大大增加了。臂力+10。

translation: [任务] 鲁特建议我和你谈谈加入搜寻阿波菲斯的事。
